description.english: Save Kalimba by defeating The Bird

description.spanish: Derrota al Pájaro y salva Kalimba.
description.brazilian: Salve Kalimba derrotando o Pássaro

description.english: Achieve an all golden Middleworld totem
description.german: Hol dir ein komplett goldenes Mittelwelt-Totem
description.french: Obtiens un totem tout en or dans le Monde du milieu
description.italian: Ottieni un totem tutto d'oro nel Mondo di Mezzo
description.spanish: Consigue todos los tótems dorados del Mundo Medio.

description.english: Get a golden totem piece in Kalimba

description.spanish: Consigue un trozo de tótem dorado. (Kalimba)

description.english: Find all challengerooms

description.french: Trouve toutes les pièces de défi
description.italian: Trova tutte le stanze sfida
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las salas de desafíos.

description.english: Re-assemble the menu pyramid

description.english: Save the Underworld by defeating The Snake

description.spanish: Salva al Mundo Inferior derrotando a la Serpiente.

description.english: The arm that holds the tree can also hold the totem
description.german: Der Arm, der den Baum hält, kann auch das Totem halten

description.brazilian: A mão que segura a árvore também segura o totem
